attributes.title: Vegeta VS Thor (DBZ VS Marvel)

attributes.title: Ben 10 VS Danny Phantom ( Cartoon Brawl )
attributes.caption: In episode 6 of DBX two charismatic cartoon champions go toe to toe in this weeks radical DBX!!! It's Ben 10 vs Danny Phantom!
attributes.description:
In episode 6 of DBX two charismatic cartoon champions go toe to toe in this weeks radical DBX!!! It's Ben 10 vs Danny Phantom! Please note that the design used for Echo Echo was inspired by a rendering from VampireRichard69 (https://www.deviantart.com/vampirerichard69/art/Ben-10-Time-s-End-Echo-Echo-765144962) altered from a pose by TheHawkDown. (https://www.deviantart.com/thehawkdown/art/Echo-Echo-608697503) All other character designs reference the official material.


Make sure to vote on the next fight here - https://forms.gle/pCxGtZyRMDTLsh517
attributes.display_title: Ben 10 VS Danny Phantom ( Cartoon Brawl )
